children.value: Download the app from the releases page:
Workspace need a name and a path, that must be a valid filesystem path
Then you can activate the workspace with the checkbox
With this you already good to go.

title: Create scripts
description: Scripts are javascript code that run simples tasks using(or not) workspace files & collections.

children.value: Scripts are javascript code that run simples tasks using(or not) workspace files & collections.
They are very powerful but they can also be dangerous if you do not take care, so pay extra attention to the code you will execute in the app.
Never run code from untrusted sources
Go to entries page and click in the plus button to create a new file.
Any file in the workspace with the extname
will be treated as a script by the app!
Open the file to access the editor and we can already write our script.
To execute the script just press the play button on top right of the page.
to help you make the operations needed in the workspace.
